name: Web Development
description: Learning web development from online courses could take anywhere from a single month to several years, depending on how much time you devote to your courses. If you finished this course seriously with work you will create and maintain websites. In addition, you may create content for the site. After finished this journey you will have much opportunity to build up your carrer as a freelancer or you can do remote job as well
